Compressing and Decompressing Data with.title: Compressing and Decompressing Data with Buffer Compression

abstract.text: Compress a string, write it to the file system, and decompress the same file using buffer compression.

Compressing and Decompressing Data with.title: Compressing and Decompressing Data with Input and Output Filters

abstract.text: Compress and decompress streamed or from-memory data, using input and output filters.
